pages.text: $(li)Changed dungeon generation to occur in smaller steps over multiple ticks.$(li)Added sound effects and particles to the keyhole to let you know that it is working.$(li)Fixed multiple bugs related to advancements.

$(li)Added a ceiling to the sandy theme and made changes to a few rooms.$(li)Fixed an armor stand bug in one of the advice rooms.$(li)Fixed a certain jailed villager's trades.$(li)Changed the mod version numbers to be less confusing with Minecraft version numbers.
